text: The Jarl of the Dragonfleet haunts the seven sea’s in search of slaves and sacrifices to Khorne. His power immense and stature grand.
With unstoppeable monentum Valbrand is the true juggernaut, a force with such velocity even his own feet have trouble carrying him.
Jarl Firebrand feasts with more than just the blood of his victims alone, his unnatural diet only adding to his already unnatural physique.
The Jarl of the Dragonfleet is as immense as he is powerful, it is apparent he has the blood gods watchful eye.
Only few Norscans travel as far as Valbrand, his endeavors proof valueable to Khorne as potential cultists join his ranks in search for blood.
Of Graeling decent Valbrand Fireblade and his flaming blade have the ability to mobilise any Norse warrior by simply raising his sword in to the air
Fireblade’s crew are as vicious as they are muscular. Only the finest and hardened raiders may call them part of his retinue.
A true servant of Khorne know’s his one decree: More skulls, more blood.
Valbrand made a pact with the lesser Daemon Suthrond, where sacrificial slaves tempt the daemon to bestow upon Valbrand powerful boons.
The band of blood thirsty raiders have devoted themselves to the one true god of slaughter.
